mixin_class.description: The dot-separated path to the mixin class relative to the specified package. The class must be annotated with @Mixin

defaultRequire.description: Sets the default minimum of injections that must be successfully applied per injector

injectionPoints.description: Registers injection points for this configuration

maxShiftBy.description: Sets the maximum allowed number of opcodes that can be shifted in @At annotations. This is hard capped at 5

conformVisibility.description: Sets whether the visibility of overwritten methods should be conformed to the target class

requireAnnotations.description: Sets whether overwriting methods must explicitly be declared through @Overwrite annotations

parent.description: The name of a parent configuration that options get inherited from

target.description: Target selector. Either the specifies the phase directly or use "@env(PHASE)" separated by '&', '\', or ' '

minVersion.description: Minimum version of the mixin subsystem required for this configuration

compatibilityLevel.description: Minimum compatibility level required for mixins in this set

required.description: Determines whether mixin failures in this configuration are considered terminal and stop the game

priority.description: The priority of this configuration. Will be inherited if smaller than 0

mixinPriority.description: Default mixin priority for this configuration. Will be inherited if smaller than 0

package.description: The target package where the mixin classes reside

mixins.description: Mixin classes to load in all environments. Class names get prepended with the specified package

client.description: Mixin classes to load ONLY on client. Class names get prepended with the specified package

server.description: Mixin classes to load ONLY on server. Class names get prepended with the specified package

setSourceFile.description: Sets whether targets' source files will be updated to the mixin source file

refmap.description: The path to the reference map resource to use for this configuration

verbose.description: Increases log detail level from DEBUG to INFO

plugin.description: Name of the mixin config plugin to use for this config
